item.title: 298 Apple Listening Reports, Monetization Realities, and Podcast Marketing Trends
item.description: Apple Podcasts new listening reports, discussing global consumer trends and podcast marketing trends, geographic and user agents download stats and a lot more! Audience feedback drives the show. We'd love for you to contact us and keep the... Feed: https://thefeed.libsyn.com/rss

item.title: Chinese Cooking Demystified: Chris Thomas and Stephanie Li visit Shaxi!
item.description: This week on Sinica: On my final two days in Shaxi in Yunnan, Chris Thomas and Stephanie Li, the hosts of the marvelous YouTube channel Chinese Cooking Demystified, joined me for some cooking and lots of chatting about food! We recorded this show together and focus our conversation on their heroic attempt at a taxonomy of different Chinese cuisines... Feed: https://rss.art19.com/sinica
